name: reserved-usernames-nodejs
description: A comprehensive Node.js library for handling reserved usernames to prevent URL collisions

scripts.update-cache: node -e "const {ReservedUsernames} = require('./index.js'); const ru = new ReservedUsernames({autoUpdate: true}); ru.on('ready', () => console.log('Cache updated'));"
scripts.clear-cache: node -e "const {ReservedUsernames} = require('./index.js'); const ru = new ReservedUsernames(); console.log('Cache cleared:', ru.clearCache());"

author: Your Name
